info.name: Tumblr : Remove Sidebar
info.description: Hides the right sidebar and centers the dashboard. Also hides some subjectively "annoying" elements like promoted posts, recommendations, and the explore icon.
info.additionalInfo:
09/11/2021 : centering was broken by an update, fixed
17/08/2021 : theme was broken by an update, this is now fixed


Without the sidebar, I've found that the dashboard loads much faster on my pc. This also hides the annoying cookie popup that keeps coming back every time I load Tumblr.
